name: MyDashboard
description: Cool and informative dashboard for Google Chrome
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://maps.googleapis.com/ https://maps.gstatic.com https://query.yahooapis.com https://connect.facebook.net https://platform.twitter.com https://cdn.syndication.twimg.com https://syndication.twitter.com https://www.google.com/ https://ssl.google-analytics.com https://www.google-analytics.com; object-src 'self'
